website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for the bodybuilder or athlete looking to add bulk and muscle.
pros: Award-winning taste blends with a variety of bases like almond milk, cow's milk, water, and fruit bases
Five different protein sources plus a mix of BCAAs, glutamine, and digestive enzymes
cons: This product isn't designed for the purist, as it contains a variety of different ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Stomach Problems :/
customer_reviews.text: I recently wanted to try a new protein powder so I switched from ON Gold Standard Whey to this MP Combat. At first I was really excited because its a protein blend and the benefits that go with that. However, my stomach can not handle this protein powder. I am not lactose intolerant and I have no known food allergies so it must be the digestive enzymes that are in this product. I get severely bloated, gassy and most recently diarrhea which has led me to stop using Combat. I'm going to try another blend and see how that goes. Really wish this product worked for me. I know a lot of my friends have no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hackett

customer_reviews.title: *** CONTAINS THE WELL KNOWN CARCINOGEN acesulfame potassium!!!! ***
customer_reviews.text: Really MusclePharm, to make the product taste sweeter you add acesulfame potassium which is a carcinogen with multiple negative side effects. Nothing like ingesting a product for health unknowingly its detrimental to your health. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: KFrog

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, more filling!! That sounds familiar...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and I searched for a protein powder that has it all...whey, casein, low to no sugar, and nice tasting... well I'm here to tell you the cookies and cream is fantastic, mix with half almond milk and half water, it's really, really good!!! I'm writing this review so you'll know to make the right choice and for the price per pound it's inexpensive for 4 pounds...I searched and compared all night; I've bought their products in the past, and they have great products!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Makes your digestive system smell like skunk bomb. Otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: Makes your digestive system smell horrible. So bad that after a few uses I stopped using it. However if you are gonna keeep using it Add a banana to it and it tastes AMAZINGLY good.
customer_reviews.author: YeaIbuystuffhere

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tasting protein powder I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein powder I have ever tried. I bought the chocolate milk flavor and put it in the fridge to cool a bit before drinking. It’s absolutely delicious. I also like that this is a protein blend and sometimes drink this before going to work. I truly believe this has made a big impact on how hungry I am after work and as a result, my ability to make wise food choices when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead31

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually mix my protein shakes with almond milk instead of water, but the taste of this powder is actually quite good. Now I know, most protein powders are chalky, gritty and sometimes hard to swallow, but this one mixes well with water and tastes great. I have never tried this brand before, but it doesn't make me feel bloated and doesn't upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: E_Dubb

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I don't know but I found it to be too sweet, and this is from a guy who loves sweets. The taste..., well, it isn't the best either. Not as good as another product I once bought but can't remember the brand. But price wise, I think this is a very good unbeatable deal as just about everything else is more expensive and this seems to offer a good amount of protein per use. So, definitely good value, which is why I give it 4 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Much tastier than most protein powders
customer_reviews.text: First off, I'm not really an athlete. I don't go to the gym regularly. I'm not a huge supplement geek. But I do care about my health and make an effort to stay active and eat a balanced diet. With that said, the most important thing to me when it comes to these supplements is taste. If the taste isn't at least decent I won't use it. So... I am happy with this purchase! The cookies n' cream flavor is really good. I blend it with ice, skim milk, water, and sugar free instant coffee mix. The only complaint I really have is that it is incredibly sticky so you have to blend it.
customer_reviews.author: ncoleyd

customer_reviews.title: cheap, works probably
customer_reviews.text: good macros, taste leaves much to be desired. chemical aftertaste. tried it with water, almond milk, cow milk, added fats to try and fix it but its just not that great. its sitting on top of my cupboard right now, half full. haven't found the grit and determination to finish it.
customer_reviews.author: tyler g

customer_reviews.title: Bug found in my protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying protein powder from MusclePharm, and unfortunately it was a terrible experience. Make sure you all check every scoop of protein powder before consuming. I bought the banana cream flavor, and not even a week has passed...and now I have to worry about dead bugs in my protein powder. Will NOT be buying from MusclePharm again!
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Personal taste as far as flavour
customer_reviews.text: This is the only protein flavour from Musclepharm ive not liked. Wife wanted chocolate, so we went with it. I ended up giving her the tub as the taste was not good, at least for me. Not a chocolate lover generally but as it was choco milk.....was super thin consistency, really watery no matter how you mixed it. IL stick with my usual banana cream, vanilla, strawberry in the future. MP protein has been excellent and il keep using it.......just not this flavour.
customer_reviews.author: Mark whalley

customer_reviews.title: Not awful; not great
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is decent, but this is one of the worst mixing protein powders I've ever used. Leaves large, sticky chunks that will clump up other supplements you add in like BCAAs. Using a blender helps but that's a big inconvenience when you need to mix up some as you're rushing out the door. It's annoying how expensive whey has gotten and at this price point they cut corners and use artificial flavorings; so lame. All because lifting and working out is popular now they can get away with charging this much. Bottom line this is decent compared to the all alternatives though
customer_reviews.author: Baby Genius

customer_reviews.title: Not USP or NSF tested, very sweet
customer_reviews.text: There's no clearly marked testing logo for any kind of standard and the banana flavor I chose was sickly sweet and overpowering even for artificial banana candy. I ended up using it as a flavoring in greek yogurt to tone down the extreme sweetness and it took forever to use up. If you're genuinely in need of protein supplementation for serious training as a competitive athlete who's already doing the most they can with their food budget I would suggest a different brand, but as a general high protein snack for casual gym hobbyists this will get you by assuming you can trust the label.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Used to be my favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 7 months ago and it was great. It tasted good, helped me meet my daily protein intake, and the price was reasonable. Now it seems like the formula changed because with my recent purchase the taste is awful and it doesn't mix as well as it used to. In addition, this powder is very harsh on your stomach and will leave you with a sick feeling after every serving. After using it for 5 days, I stopped taking it due to the digestive issues it induces. Save your money and purchase elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Segarra

customer_reviews.title: This is freakin sweet! too sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine how this product came with this sweetness. I've ordered cookie and cream flavor because I saw many good reviews from it, and finally when I tried this power for the first time I almost got sick. It's so sweet that it almost disgusted me. Now, I don't know what to do with this I can't even return this very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy99

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this MP Comabt protein powder (triple berry). My favorite of the few brands I've tried. Really good taste, it's high quality mixture. Tastes like a berry milkshake. Definitely a high quality protein powder. I would recommend the triple berry if you like that strawberry type of flavor. It's good deal in the 4 lb size. I use it for a quick meal, like breakfast or in between meals for a snack or filler, after work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonion Purchaser Guy

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO MIX AND ZERO CLUMPS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was on a search for a better protein blend something that obviously didn't clump every single time you put it in a blender bottle. And I read reviews because they help level my decision making I've come across two brands. And I actually bought both this was the leading brand I bought first. Everything is there for me and I can mix it with either water or milk, take my f*cking money!!! And the powder is so light in texture it's AMAZING...AND THE FLAVOR 😍 it's not chalky, and doesn't have a horrible after taste and smells great, can't go wrong with chocolate flavored things and chocolate milkshake you have won my heart. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: sexylatinaloca

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a cheaper option... don’t
customer_reviews.text: Extremely average. Taste is below par and also upsets my stomach. Decided to mix up my routine of buying Optimum Nutrition and was swayed by the $40 price tag for 4 lbs. It’s worth paying a little extra for the Gold Standard because after about 3 shakes of this, the taste only gets worse. I am now realizing why the cookies & cream flavor is significantly less expensive than the chocolate flavors..... I will definitely be going back to ON Gold Standard which is only a few cents more per shake. Hope this helps all who are trying to make the same decision I was. Don’t make the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: not a flavor i woudl recommend..try the others
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact this product uses multiple protein sources and have purchased the cookies and cream as well as the chocolate flavors from this company multiple times. When i got bored and wanted to switch it up, I ordered the mixed berry and I've honestly been avoiding it. I still have half the tub left and just have no desire to use it. The flavor is disappointing in my opinion, and I honestly believe this flavor mixes worse than the other 2 aforementioned. Maybe I just got a bad tub, but I was disappointed and will not be ordering Mixed Berry flavor again. Would recommend milk chocolate and cookies and cream.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein! Best Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has casein protein in it! Great price. Vanilla is Great tasting and mixes well with everything. I have seen noticeable gains with 3-5 days of weight training per week at an hour per session. Moderate to Vigerous intensity. combined with a well timed clean diet, exersize and rest this protein is the best bang for your buck. Also this includes BCAA,s without any additional supplements like caffeine or creatine. This is good because I like to manage the use of various supplements periodically on different levels.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bruneau

customer_reviews.title: The best protein I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different brands of protein. I got this one by chance when the price was reduced. I had no idea about this product. Now, I have finished 4 lb and I am happy with the results. A reader must remember that the protein in this product is a combination of 5 different sources including Protein Powder, Isolate Whey Protein, Casein, and Egg Protein. All 25 grams of protein is not WHEY. To get better results, I mixed one scoop of this product with one scoop of 100% whey protein right after my workout at 11 PM. Because of my bad working out time, this product gave me everything I needed after the workout and before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amir B.

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein and the best "berry" flavor available
customer_reviews.text: I've been using "berry" flavored protein for 20 years. Drank Dymatize berry until it was discontinued and have searched for a great tasting berry protein ever since. I mix 1 scoop Combat with 1 scoop isopure vanilla & 6 oz apple juice and the Combat berry tastes delicious. A LOT of flavor, not too sweet and a high quality protein. And at a great price from Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Mitchel Martin

customer_reviews.title: I buy this all the time, best tasting protein powder I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite powder on the market. 25 grams of protein from whey with almost no sugar is a big plus. I usually try to grab this at Costco when it’s on sale but the price here is still solid. But it is by far the best tasting out there. No chalky aftertaste, a genuine flavor. I usually blend this with ice, Greek yogurt, almond milk and peanut butter. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Good protein supp
customer_reviews.text: Good product but not the best tasting. For a comparable product, syntha-six is much better tasting in my personal experience. This flavor cookies and cream, for combat protein taste more like sweet skim milk. Syntha-six has flavor and some fat which makes it taste more appealing and gives the shake some body. This one is just very light and sweet. Not very enjoulyable or rewarding after a heavy workout session.
customer_reviews.author: MTAY

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product. Not worth taking a chance.
customer_reviews.text: Product is inconsistent. The texture has varied significantly between shipments. Sometimes, it's a gritty sand-like powder, other times it's fine like baby powder. The taste has varied too; sometimes it's great, other times it's super strong and has an overpowering synthetic taste to it. If I could get the fine, more pleasantly-flavored variant more regularly, I'd keep ordering, but I'm moving to Dymatize ISO 100. With such inconsistencies, who knows what else is changing, nutritionally, with this product.
customer_reviews.author: El Andy

customer_reviews.title: The nutritional content is FALSE
customer_reviews.text: I shop protein based on several factors but one of the main factors is cholesterol amount. The label on this product says there is 40’ish mg of cholesterol per serving which is reasonably low. However the product I received, which looked identical to the photo for the product has 80mg of cholesterol. 80!!! They either shipped me the wrong protein or their label is factually inaccurate. Buyers beware if you are watching cholesterol intake this is not the protein you want.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna E. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Possibly conterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from BJ's a couple of months ago and liked it and was happy I could order it directly from Amazon. It just arrived yesterday. From the outside, it looks exactly the same. The inside, however, not the same. The consistency is slightly off and the taste is way off. The outside does not mention a new formula or anything different so I am not sure why it looks and tastes completely different. The scoop is different too. I read somewhere else that this might be a counterfeit protein powder and I am thinking that it's very possible. I plan to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and dissolves great!
customer_reviews.text: Most protein powders taste pretty good, and this one is no different. However, to me, the taste is not as important as the quality of the dissolving of the powder into liquid. I hate drinking a protein shake and the powder does not dissolve well into the liquid. It's quite hard to take drinks and keep getting chunks of undissolved protein trying to sneak down your throat. With this protein, that's not a worry. It dissolves GREAT. Like, throw it into some liquid, give it a couple shakes, and get your 25g of protein. Plus, like I mentioned, the taste is really good too, better than many I've tried. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: robert wagener

customer_reviews.title: TASTES TOO SWEET BUT HAVE TESTED A WORKAROUND
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about Muscle Pharm products especially their protein powder which packs the essential nutrients for athletes at an affordable price. Unfortunately, this protein powder is too DAMN sweet! I have read reviews regarding this matter but I wanted to try it out for myself because everybody is different. Solution: I would recommend purchasing BSN Syntha 6 in the flavor that you like such as Banana and mixing a half scoop of each. This actually tastes pretty good and helped me save a bit of $$. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: J.Money

customer_reviews.title: MusclePharm Combat Protein?
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake, all it is chocolate or vanilla flavor with a lot of sugar, there is no way it will make you a muscles, please search online for the lawsuits that been filed against this product, there is over 200 lawsuits against them, it was my fault that I didn't do the search, their consumer service will not answer you, plus mine came with a hole in the bottom of the bag, maybe the mice like the sugar taste.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is trash
customer_reviews.text: I used to get musclepharm but moved to Syntha-6 a couple of years ago. I went back and tried it again looking for a decent option for less money. The flavor is awful! So bad. It also didn't blend well so I had those gooey chunks in basically every shake. It didn't matter what size bottle I put it in, how much liquid I put in, what liquid I put in, how much powder I put in, whether I used a shaker bottle or a blender. I won't go back to any flavor of musclepharm.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chalenburg

customer_reviews.title: It has palm oil
customer_reviews.text: Is good but I give one star because it has palm oil and is very sweet.. I wouldn’t buy again because of the palm oil
customer_reviews.author: Rhosyanetzy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is really good. No chalky taste and dissolves into water quickly, so you don’t get a swig of nasty. Has a good protein count and fairly clean ingredients. Overall, recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: The quality significantly dropped
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this protein has significantly decreased in the last 6 months. My husband went from having 2 shakes a day to completely canceling our subscription because the powder would lump together and not break up and it really hurt his stomach. Very disappointing because this stuff was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It lead me to an acne breakout
customer_reviews.text: This chocolate flavor lead me to break out in acne on my face. I personally do have a predisposition to chocolate somewhat but I have noticed it containers "Coca Bean Powder" which is highly concentrated. I like the Muscle Pharm protein so I switched to Cookies and Cream and Vanilla. C&C has "Coca Powder" which is less concentrated and Vanilla has no hints of coca. I've gotten 90% better in just a week not using this. and switching to other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, good quality, very sweet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Chocolate Milk flavor, and it is delicious. Though I will say, like many others have said, it is extremely sweet. I add instant coffee to my shakes and I can't even taste the bitterness of the coffee over the sweetness of the chocolate, where I used to taste it with other protein powders. Another user mentioned they get stinky farts from this protein as well. I can confirm, farts after drinking this are FOUL! But I still like the powder. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've had two flavors, chocolate and the cookies and creme and both tasted great. I like that this powder uses multiple protein sources for fast and slow release. It mixes well with milk in just a shaker with a few very small 'unmixed' particles but no big clumps. I like to mix it with yesterdays left over coffee and milk, about 3:1, pre-workout to get a little caffein boost. I always seem to make small gains in weight with this. It's my 'go to' protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty at all!
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the market for whey protein that is cheaper and tastes the same as ON, this is probably not the one. It tastes chalky and its too sweet for my taste. The sugar content is much higher compared to other good brands and I would prefer those over this any other day. I only went for this because it was cheap but I wouldn't recommend this to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Supplement Out There
customer_reviews.text: I have been using whey protein for 4-5 years now, and I have been through many products. When I got this, I had never changed since. I have the chocolate flavor, so it's been perfect standalone mixing with water or milk. This also works extremely well with smoothies! I'm sure many of you get crumbs of protein in your mouth, but this has never done that. This protein will remain standard with me for a long time as I have never found such a perfect balance in flavor and mixability.
customer_reviews.author: Nis220

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting this product to taste as good as it does for a protein powder. I have had some pretty horrible cookies and cream Proteins in past experience. This one Is Top of the line in taste and flavor IMO. The Servings are plentiful. Good Value. I would buy this product again and also recommend this brand of protein to friends and colleagues if asked.
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix in a shaker, tastes great, the packaging is not bulky, and provides 25g of protein!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Protein Powder. Its one of the few protein powders that taste great with cold or luke warm water...whatever you have available. It also works as a combo in your smoothies. Also, this chocolate flavor is a flavor you wont get tired of. I have used this consistently for the past 8 months and have not gotten tired of the taste. Easy to mix in a shaker, tastes great, the packaging is not bulky, and provides 25g of protein!
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: The best by far the price to weight ratio
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off on saying how great this stuff tastes and how great the quality is easily put it in a Shaker and Shake mixes well I have had my share of protein powders and price to weight ratio this one is by far the best that I have ever had don't take my word for it but definitely worth the money to try for yourself chocolate milk is my favorite and for all of you guys looking for that miracle in a powder it's not going to happen you have to work for it but this stuff by all means will take about a month to feel the difference
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, easy mix, surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I honestly bought this because it wasn’t too pricey and was rated well but expected it to taste nasty like 99.9% of protein powders- but this tastes like chocolate milk (and I just mix with water! Easy mix and tastes good. Much better than others I’ve used- and I am a competitor and have tried dozens of brands (at least 20 brands and flavors). Surprisingly good and a good value
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Torkelsen

customer_reviews.title: Get Jacked
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I usually switch between MP & Standard Weigh protein just to change it up. This was the first time I have tried cookies and creme from MP and I will definitely be purchasing it again. The flavor and consistency once mixed were on point. I read some reviews before purchasing about the product being sweet. It is on the sweet side but delicious and definitely better than not enough flavor
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST TASTING PROTEIN POWDER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Ok seriously this stuff is great! Not only is it a good protein powder BUT IT TASTE AMAZING!!!! I have had moments where I crave something sweet and grab this as a healthy substitute and OMG it's good. As a protein powder it also does extremely well in replenishing/building muscles. Used to stay sore for days after the gym and this helps cut that down a lot Pro tip: blend it with ice and make it into a smoothie/milkshake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check for opened seal!
customer_reviews.text: I will return this. I opened the box and found that the seal of the protein cap was broken. I looked inside to see if the white seal was broken too and it was. This protein shake was opened before it was packaged. I am going to ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Cookies and Cream = Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Delicious (cookies and cream) Easy to mix Great price sold No stomach issues for lactose sensitive Cons: Really, none! My personal go to protein powder. Great price sold for this larger container which tends to last a month or so. I use this product to supplement my workouts and have never had any stomach issues as I would experience with other brands. Highly recommend the cookies and cream flavor
customer_reviews.author: Blissea

customer_reviews.title: Combat protein blend
customer_reviews.text: I have used combat protein for a while now. Really like how easy it mixes I use it in the am a scoop mixed in with my oats and pb also have a shake after workouts I only buy blended proteins seems to be less bloat and stomach craps. Definitely a good deal at 50 servings for under $30 bucks. Best flavor I found from this brand is the chocolate milk mixed with pb and oats reminds me of drinking a no bake cookie. My only complaint is with the cookies and cream flavor it is just too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael b

customer_reviews.title: GREAT - price, taste, quality
customer_reviews.text: MP seldom dissapoints in quality and this product is no exception. I got the chocolate flavor which dissolves and taste better than any of the other flavors, and It is not overly sweet (reminds me of chocolate milk without the sugar/sweetener), so I dont mind having it more than once a day. Anyhow great price, great taste, and nice protein blend for those not overly picky about specific sources or clean proteins. Will stick with chocolate from now on and recommend the same for any1 trying to decide on flavor
customer_reviews.author: Dobsas

customer_reviews.title: Yummy. Banana cream flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! He especially loves how I prepare it! We also love this it’s keto approved/friendly! My shake recipe: 8oz of coconut milk 1tsp unsweetened cocoa powder 1 scoop of protein powder 2-4 oz freshly brewed coffee (cooled) 1 heaping spoon of PB or other nut butter Try it out and thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Works for an old guy!
customer_reviews.text: I am an older guy who was not getting enough protein in my diet per doc's required 50 grams per day so I do one scoop for breakfast each morning. I use milk chocolate in both 2% milk or water. Water a bit week but ok. If I have a mid-day snack I use water and half scoop. Both options have made me feel full and helped me cut back on the junk food I normally ate. The 5lb jug is a bit large/difficult to store versus the 2.5lb but I am cheap so continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Muscle Pharm Combat powder is my go to source! It mixes very well and tastes great. In addition it comes packed with 5 protein sources, BCAA's and Glutamine. Great value for the money compared to other products. This time I ordered banana cream, I was a bit skeptical because this flavor can be hit or miss. It ended up being a hit and you will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can trust MusclePharm
customer_reviews.text: Choosing a protein powder is difficult because there are so many brands and because the FDA doesn't regulate supplements, they can basically say whatever they want is in there. If you've ever taken too much MP creatine and felt the muscle swelling pain, you know that MP puts in their products, what they claim is in there. This is one of the lowest calorie 25g protein powders that I've been able to find consistently and I feel confident that I'm actually getting what they say I'm getting in my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a hole in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Good protein for a good price. Unfortunately when my box was delivered, and picked it up, I noticed powder leaking out the side. There was a pencil sized hole in the bag with the protein leaking out. Lost about a serving worth. There was zero damage to the box itself so the bag must have been damaged before shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of this chocolate (didn't care for cookies and creme) protein powder, and as a bonus it doesn't make me gassy. (TMI?) Perfect with ice, frozen banana, spinach, and a bit of peanut butter. Filling and satisfies my sweet tooth. It IS sweet. If you don't want sweet, this is not the mix for you.
customer_reviews.author: t64

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protein for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste of the vanilla, and all the supplements you get in this mix are excellent. My son loves the cookies and cream version. Chocolate Milk Shake is excellent too. There is a minimum amount of clumping when you mix it in a sports shaker bottle, but no clumping in the blender at all. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: GLAP

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Been sticking with a single protein powder for several years now. Forced to flip to a new one... have 10 different ones half used under my kitchen counter as I can't get used to all the chemical tastes of some of them. Finally found a winner here.
customer_reviews.author: aj price

customer_reviews.title: It's REALLY good!
customer_reviews.text: This is delicious! The last time I tried a protein drink was late 80's. Not very good. I've been having digestive issues, I have cut out a lot of foods, and I don't eat after 3 anymore. I thought this might be something I could drink late afternoon. So far after 3 days I love it! I am amazed at how good it is! I mix 1/2 milk 1/2 water and use a blender. Yummy! And I feel full late in the day now. Easy on my stomach too.
customer_reviews.author: Trainer Lady

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to advertised.
customer_reviews.text: When i first purchased this item, it said that there was no soy protein added. That's one thing I look for in protein mixes. when i received it, I learned, by way of the label that it did indeed have soy protein. I was going to return it, but sold it to friend who loved the taste. As for the taste, its ok, has a bit of a mediciney taste to it. I prefer another brands taste.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto B

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate taste mixed with milk or water and ice.
customer_reviews.text: Great chocolate taste. Add crushed ice and it makes a thick shake. My husband, daughter and I all drink this product and like the taste and smooth way it mixes.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Taste I’ve Had!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is the single most important factor when I purchase protein powder. If I don’t like the taste, I won’t use it. After reading many reviews of many different powders, I decided to give Combat Protien Cookies and Cream flavor a try. I am very impressed! The taste is fantastic! I use it almost daily now! The only issue is that there are black “cookie pieces” that float around and will settle pretty quickly after stirred. It doesn’t affect flavor or texture significantly. Minus one star for this.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Busacker

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good. Great protien.
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a great product. I have been using this as a meal replacement/workout supplement for several months with great results. I love the "take it any time" ability with the different proteins. Taking one star away for this flavor. Its not bad but after 4 LBS it really starts to wear on you. There are better flavors in this line-up. Great price and speedy delivery as always. Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S

customer_reviews.title: Wow Taste Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I've been on and off for the past couple of years on protein shakes but I was never able to down a shake without some sort of dairy. Let me TELL YOU WITH WATER IT TASTE SIMILAR TO YOOHOO. And I was very skeptical reading the comments saying "Taste like Nesquick " well I can actually see it. and for the price its a bargain !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein blend.
customer_reviews.text: well it's protein, a good value for a blend of proteins, and there's nothing bad to say about it, it's the only really good option I found for a blend, the flavor, cookies and cream, they nailed it, even the texture of a cookie they worked in there somehow it's interesting and a little different but good, very good. great support for recovery I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Cody T. May

customer_reviews.title: Insanely great price / performance ratio
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I have recommended this product to has LOVED the taste, and the price is even more shocking. MP has really made a top of the line product with the combat powder. I personally recommend the cookies n creme in your morning oats, and add the chocolate into your black coffee and use a milk frother ($12) to change your life. Less bloat from creamer and better macros. Win/win. Grab this protein now.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Vu

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyy to sweet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this being a cheap a$$. I normally buy the 5lb optimum nutrition in either chocolate mint or double chocolate. I figured I would try to find a cheaper solution. MusclePharm is like 55 cents per serving, while ON whey is like 78. I think I will be choking down this 4lb container but switching back to ON after its done. I ordered the MusclePharm in chocolate milk flavor and it tastes so gross... Its disgustingly sweet (tastes like artificial sweet). There is no way in hell this stuff can be good for us tasting the way it does. It was worth a shot tho...
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Eastman

customer_reviews.title: This protein powder used to be awesome, but they must have changed the formula since ...
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder used to be awesome, but they must have changed the formula since I last purchased it. I used to put a full scoop in about 8oz of iced coffee and it was amazing. Now I can't even put half a scoop into 10 oz of coffee without it tasting just terrible. The change messed with how well it mixes too. Used to be maybe 30-60 seconds of shaking and it would be silky smooth. Now I can shake for 3-4 minutes and have half the powder still be little clumps all over the place. Please go back to the old formula.
customer_reviews.author: Rc

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Protein
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein. Have been using it for years now. Milk chocolate is my favorite flavor. I mix it with chocolate milk and It's delicious. It's not clumpy for me as long as you shake the mixer cup for long enough - about 30 seconds. I've never had a bag arrive damaged and don't see how all these people can give a negative review of a product based on how poorly the product was handled during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Milkshake.. Without the milk??!
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of this one by far! Used to have ON before. However to get the most out of it I would have to mix it with milk peanut butter and a banana (and I do this twice a day which can be very time-consuming). With MusclePharm all I do is pour water and mix, and it tastes miles better! Plus it comes with one gram more protein per scoop lol
customer_reviews.author: Jerwin V.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but doesn't mix well
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Musclepharm line of protein powders. Love banana, chocolate and vanilla. This went on sale and after being disappointed in evlution nutrition powder, I was all in. First, it really does taste great. But, this particular powder does not mix as well as the other Musclepharm powders. It definitely leaves chunks of powder in water. It's not terrible by any means but something to note. Would buy again if its on sale.
customer_reviews.author: MClarke10

customer_reviews.title: SO good!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cookies and cream flavor and have used it for a couple years. Just now decided to try the banana cream to try something different. OMG so good! Reminds me of banana pudding. My favorite is to mix it with plain greek yogurt and banana slices with some cereal on top. Really great on its own with almond milk, or in a smoothie. Not as sweet as the cookies and cream, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Worst Experience!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely HORRIBLE!! I decided to try this one because of its low price, but ever since I got this protein powder I have a nightmare every time I want to drink my post-workout shake. The taste is ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE! Too sweet, horrible taste, and a very watery texture even if you add two full scoops of it to a low volume of milk. And it gets worse when I see how it affects my stomach after I drink it. You feel like there is a baloon inside your stomach. Even 1 star is too many stars for it. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Aryan

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for my replacement
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for sometime now and like it alot. I'm giving it a 1 star because the last order had protein powder all over the inside of the box, (the bag was opened). We sent it back for a replacement and that was over a month ago and I've yet to receive the replacement. A good product is one thing.... good customer service is another. A company needs to be good at both.
customer_reviews.author: robcam817

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I’m normally not a fan of chocolate flavor but this stuff is awesome tasting. As a protein powder it does what it says. I intermittent fasting and this works great to supply me with various types of protein. The powder mixes fairly well and leaves no after taste.
customer_reviews.author: V Kool

customer_reviews.title: Good product, mixes well and keeps me powered up for several hours...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for about two months now. Have lost weight with lots of discipline and this product along with my morning smoothie really gets me to the mid afternoon with no hunger issues. Mixes easily in water or milk with no unmixed residue! Taste is great (have used the cookies a d cream along with this chocolate flavor.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: MO Combat Whey protein has all the same great ingredients and nutrients as other, more expensive protein powders that you can get (with a smaller serving per container to boot). It tastes delicious, the chocolate milk flavor is not for nothing, because it taste is damn near identical and I take it with water, mind you. Overall this is the best bang for your buck around after only two weeks of taking it I am already seeing results. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste is amazing! Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: From a very picky eater!!! I bought this stuff based on price and reviews. I've spent big bucks on several protein products! And no matter what I've mixed into other products (peanut butter, chocolate syrup all sorts of bad stuff) it's always tasted like crap! BUT THIS STUFF IS ASTONISHING! IT TASTES AMAZING! I MIX IT WITH 2% MILK AND IT TASTES SOOOO GOOD! NO ODD PROTEIN CHEMICAL TYPE TASTE, MIXES GOOD,SMELLS GOOD, CHOCOLATE LOVERS THIS WILL HELP WITH CRAVINGS! I haven't convinced myself to try with water yet. But I'm sure that will be good too!
customer_reviews.author: Reno Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Has a lot of flavor, and is pretty low-cal given the amount of protein in it. I wanted a powder that had protein but not a lot of unnecessary calories. This is perfect because it has exactly that AND plenty of flavor to mask the cardboardy taste of whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: It is SUPER SWEET. I love sweet but I couldn’t drink it and after more than a year I had to trash it completely because I never drank it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanny Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: FYI
customer_reviews.text: Per serving is 9.9 grams of non-protein filler! Of which is 1.5g fat and 5g of carbs = 6.5g!
customer_reviews.author: B. Smedley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this the other day and reordered for my girlfriend because it was that amazing. The taste is so much better then the grocery store protein powder I normally get (6 star or body fortress) the scoop isn’t that big and is low on carbs with a overall good calorie count coming in under 150 per scoop. Would recommend and going to purchase in the future time and time again
customer_reviews.author: Pelle F.

customer_reviews.title: disgusting
customer_reviews.text: this has to be the worst tasting powder ive ever had the tub also seemed light, as in i dont think it was even filled the way it should of been should have gone with optimal nutrition gold standard 0/10 two thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Noba

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like a milkshake!
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of trouble finding a protein shake flavor that I actually like, and doesn't taste bad. I tried whey, nope. I tried vegan protein powder, it was gross. This one legit tastes like a milkshake. You can mix it with either milk or water. I personally prefer to mix it with water because it is a little too sweet for me, but either taste great. Keeps you full and also nourished. 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Besmira Alija

customer_reviews.title: Very good timed release protein with good mixability.
customer_reviews.text: Good value pound for pound-But needs to contain lower calories and cholesterol to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a good quality protein powder but it tastes awful because it’s way too sweet. I tried a shake and putting it with coffee. I even tried half a scoop with a large cup and it was still way too sweet. I might have to stop taking it because I just can’t handle how sweet it is. I’m not sure why they decided that was a good idea
customer_reviews.author: F2010

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: this tastes like the thickest( in a bad way lol), sweetest shake you've ever had. even when mixed with water this stuff is bad. it gets waaaay to frothy and thick. hell the smell makes me sick. if you've drank a lot of protein you can tell that this stuff has a LOT of concentrate in it and not all the other "blends" they say is in this. stick with ON Gold Standard. it mixes better and isn't half as thick.
customer_reviews.author: BLKWLNT

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Blend.
customer_reviews.text: The banana pudding flavor is by far the BEST tasting flavor there is. Mixed with either milk or almond milk is tastes like your eating actual banana pudding. I’m lactose intolerant to milk so I mix it with water on the go. Mixed with water makes it taste so-so. You be the judge. This protein blend is by far the best on the market. What makes it so good is the fact that it not only has Whey but Casein protein and few different proteins for absorption. If you want to build muscle and cut fat this is your go to product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting but is it Best Results!?
customer_reviews.text: Use this for after work out. One of the best tasing shakes I have tried. The price is better than most of the competition if not all. However, does my body absorb all of this protein , I am not sure. I think I have had better results with Dymatize ISO 100. But it’s hard to measure that. It feels like when I was drinking the other protein, I had better results come in
customer_reviews.author: 4real4real

customer_reviews.title: I use Musclepharm the most
customer_reviews.text: I’ve found Musclepharm to be one of the best protein powders. I found all the flavors Tasty, mix well and haave a great amount of muscle building ingredients. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kalinowsky

customer_reviews.title: Favorite protein, great price and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried maybe 15 different protein brands in my long history of working out and this brand is my favorite by far. I just mix one scoop with about 6 oz of water in a blender bottle and it tastes great. Not too strong of a flavor but not too watered down. Just the right balance. I only get the chocolate flavor though, I have not tried any of the other ones. For the price, the amount of protein you get can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is this really protein powder?
customer_reviews.text: Due to their taste, consistency, price, and lack of quality ingredient, I highly dislike drinking protein shakes; however MusclePharm Banana Creme protein powder is awesome! I love to drink it with diced strawberries. I highly recommend this protein powder. Pros: Tastes great Mixes easily Excellent price Cons: N/A
customer_reviews.author: Solovino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protein
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this protein for over a year. I was hesitant to buy it because cookies and cream can taste terribly bad. So I bought some at due to try and see if it was worth it. Bottom line, it’s delicious. I mix it with water and I have no issues at all. I have made this my daily protein. It helps me keep lean muscle mass on my body. If I doubled up, I’m sure I’d gain. I can honestly say that I found this to be an absolutely excellent protein!!
customer_reviews.author: TexasGuy

customer_reviews.title: Five different sources of protein, digesting at different rates of speed.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 4 star rating because it doesn't mix well with just a spoon. Use a shaker cup, or a blender when you use this. Other than that, it's a great product. Five different sources of protein, digesting at different rates is very good, since it ensures you get time release. Great tasting, with milk, or water, but, especially with milk. Smooth, thick, and rich! And I love the serving size. Will buy again, and again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: I feel test is not good. My husband like it. But didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tapashi banerjee

customer_reviews.title: Tastes so good
customer_reviews.text: Sooo good. 2 scoops, with cinnamon, cacao, and a splash of almond milk. I've tried a buncha flavors and this is my go-to. Great price too. And the gains bro. The gains
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if this just a bad batch, but it doesn't smell like any of the other protein powders that I've ever bought, and it is way too sickly-sweet for a protein powder. I'll be going back to optimum nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely best protein for oatmeal! Great flavor easy to dissolve.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best protein for oatmeal! Great flavor easy to dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: California models use this
customer_reviews.text: Can mix it in with water and it dissolves doesnt get all globbed up like some whey proteins. Have seen insane results using this to supplement my daily protein intake my body looks great and feels great. Ill continue to use this protein in the future. If u have a costco membership its cheaper there ;). Got you
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: New Bottle Was Contaminated with Nuts
customer_reviews.text: My son has nut allergies that lead to anaphylaxis. He just finished up a bottle of this and we opened a new one yesterday. One shake and within 15 minutes his face was swelling. Had to go to the ER. He's good now after getting a shot and taking meds. We'll have to look for something that guarantees not to cross-contaminate. Thanks MusclePharm!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Meek

customer_reviews.title: Tastes TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Hello AMAZONERS! Heed this. It's protein. It works. It's fine. But the taste? Sometimes when I need to reach my protein intake, I'm willing to take a scoop or two of this. But if you're the type of person to just put your powder in water and mix it up, STOP! It tastes so bad. Oh mah gawd. I nearly throw up every time I drink this. I chug it down because the taste is just so repulsive to me. Maybe I'm weird. But it's so gross. This is worth the price and there's nothing wrong with the powder so I'm still giving it a 4 star. But I definitely won't be finishing the entire bucket, which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

product_meta.title: MusclePharm Combat Protein Powder, 5 Protein Blend, Chocolate Milk, 4 Pounds, 52 Servings
product_meta.description:
University-formulated and banned-substance tested with rigorous standards for safe use, Combat Protein Powder’s whey formula is an ultra-premium blend containing 100% whey protein powder. It has been engineered for athletes seeking to maintain lean muscle and replenish nutrients after workouts to fuel muscle recovery and performance. Plus, it tastes great and mixes easily. Our proprietary blend of essential whey protein powder, isolate whey protein, casein, and egg protein helps build lean muscle mass, while BCAAs and glutamine enhance muscle recovery. Combined, these essential ingredients assist muscle growth, optimize recovery, and support overall strength.

MusclePharm goes the extra mile to provide our consumers with superior quality whey isolate protein powder and workout formulas that are 100% safe to use. Our protein powder has added glutamine, BCAAs, and digestive enzymes that have been certified by Informed-Choice. We verify that all our products are banned-substance tested, so you can feel confident in the supplements you’re putting into your body. We also make sure you get more bang for your buck out of every scoop. Each scoop of our 100% whey protein powder is packed with 25 g of 100% whey protein, in the form of whey protein isolate and whey protein concentrate, which digests quickly to help satisfy your daily protein needs. This product is low in fats and free of artificial dyes, fillers, gluten, and other undesirable ingredients.

Our Combat Protein Powder tastes great, mixes easily, and goes well with almond milk, water, milk, fruits, and vegetables. It’s perfect for smoothies and shakes that taste great, and it’s highly effective at helping build muscle and assisting in recovery. Take this protein powder with 100% whey any time of day, before or after a workout, to fuel the athlete inside you with an ultra-premium, quality protein experience.
feature_bullets: University-studies formulated: MusclePharm combat protein powder was created for athletes who demand optimized recovery, muscle growth, and support strength.
Award-winning taste: Our essential whey protein powder mixes easily and goes great with almond milk, water, milk, fruits, and vegetables. It’s perfect for great-tasting smoothies and shakes

5 Protein sources: our isolate Whey powder contains 25 g of protein from 5 unique protein sources. They include Both fast- and slow-digesting proteins, fueling muscles and delivering performance for hours

Banned-substance tested and certified by Informed-Choice. Athletes who see the Informed-Choice logo on a product can be assured it has undergone rigorous checks and testing to ensure that it is not contaminated with banned substances and is safe to use
100% Satisfaction guarantee: All MusclePharm products are backed by a 30-day full money-back guarantee.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
